name: Stackable Gems
description: Adds another variation of gems that can stack together. Transmute a gem in the Cube to convert it between the two variants. Based on https://www.nexusmods.com/diablo2resurrected/mods/80.
author: olegbl

config.name: Convert When Destacking
config.description: Enable to have the split off gem automatically convert to a non-stackable variant when splitting a stack. Warning: this adds 15k+ cube recipes which slows down the game's startup.
